mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_HOS_RECORDS JOIN TB_PET USING (PET_NO) WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM IND, HOS_NO, TO_CHAR(HOS_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') "HOS_DATE", PET_NAME petName FROM TB_HOS_RECORDS JOIN TB_PET USING (PET_NO) WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY HOS_NO DESC) ORDER BY IND DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM IND, HOS_NO, TO_CHAR(HOS_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') "HOS_DATE", PET_NAME FROM TB_HOS_RECORDS JOIN TB_PET USING (PET_NO) WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY HOS_NO DESC) ORDER BY IND DESC) WHERE HOS_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE (#{startDate}) AND TO_DATE (#{endDate})+1
